DOC.brief_summary: Objectives : To evaluate safety ; efficacy ; bone mineral metabolism & immunity change use Metlin & Metlos add Infant Formula Study Design : Randomized , double blind , clinical , controlled trial , 600 full-term infant 15 ± 7 day randomize recive formula probiotic + Metlin + Metlos ; formula probiotic + Metlin ; Formula probiotic + Metlos ; formula probiotic formula without probiotic prebiotics ; totally breast feed group control. ) . Outcomes variables frequency stool ; bowel intolerance manifestation ( abdominal distension , flatulency , regurgitation , vomit ) ; report dermatological problem like eczema ; change intestinal microbiota ; lipid profile ( cholesterol , triglyceride , lipoprotein associate cholesterol ) ; anthropomorphic profile somatic growth ( weight gain , stature , arm mean circumference , skin fold ) ; bone mineral metabolism ( high-speed bone ultrasonography ) ; change immunity ( change concentration salivary IgA frequency respiratory event suggestive infection ) ] . Statistical analysis make STATA Ver . 11.0 Mac . Safety efficacy variable , compare Chi square case categorical variable ANOVA Kruskall Wallis numeric variable . When convenient , covariates adjustment do ANOVA multiple lineal regression continuous numerical outcome logistic regression categoric outcome . In hypothesis test p significant value < 0.05 use .
DOC.brief_title: A Prebiotic Agave Derivated Metlin & Metlos Infant Formula
DOC.criteria: Healthy term baby ( 37 42 week gestationl age ) Age 15 ± 7 day admission Birth weight > 2,490 g. Negative history formula intolerance ( randomized baby ) Signed Informed Consent Clinical evidence chronic cardiac , respiratory , gastrointestinal , hematological metabolic disease .
